org.red5.io.matroska.dtd

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.io.matroska.dtd.Tag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryTag, CompoundTag, FloatTag, SimpleBlock, StringTag, UnsignedIntegerTag

    public abstract class Tag
extends Object
    Base class for all webm tags
